task.summary: Remove unnecesary files from output directory and add parsley library
Migrate to Parsley. * Replace signals to parsley messaging * Replace command to mapping * Replace Interfaces to apstract classes * Replace Robolegs context to parsley config
Migrage command functionality to parsley commands
Separate TextInput componenet from SearchField. Add focus IN/OUT effect
Separate GUIGrout with layout implementation from List component. And separate ViewComponent from GUIElement
Separate common GUI framework add WindowManager to it Implement OrderWinodow sketch
Optimize List commit properties. Implement default close method in window base.
Send order to server and broat cast it via email. Add ability to save input after sending order. Adjust local flash player launch
Split HTML parsing from service-layer functionality.
Draw transparent carpet behind the window
Add "removed" state to common gui framework
Add total price to order window and auto resize it and update count of products in shopping cart after reopen
Add "forms" and "validator" to improve order form
